text.language: Mn/c y/ti mou Kurie: ent/ bacilia~cou:
Remember me O Lord when You come into Your kingdom.

language.div: Ingatlah aku, ya Tuhan saat Kau datang di KerajaanMu

text.language: إذكرنى يارب متى جئت فى ملكوتك.
Mn/c y/ti mou Agie: ent/ bacilia~cou:
Remember me O Holy One when You come into Your kingdom.

language.div: Ingatlah aku, ya Raja saat Kau datang di KerajaanMu

text.language: إذكرني يا قدوس متى جئت فى ملكوتك.
Mn/c y/ti mou Decpota: ent/ bacilia~cou.
Remember me O Master when You come into Your kingdom.

language.div: Ingatlah aku, ya MahaKudus saat Kau datang di kerajaanMu

text.language: إذكرنى يا سيد متى جئت فى ملكوتك.
